description.en:
If your company pays for you to attend, or if you use Python professionally. When you purchase a Business Ticket, you help us keep the conference affordable for everyone. 
Thank you!

Access to Conference Days & Sprint Weekend (19-23 July). Tutorials are **NOT** included. To access Tutorial days please buy a Tutorial or Combined ticket.

**Net price €450 + 21% Czech VAT**.  

Available until sold out or 30 June.

Access to Workshop/Tutorial Days (17-18 July) and the Sprint Weekend (22-23 July), but **NOT** the main conference (19-21 July). 
**Net price €350.00+ 21% Czech VAT.**

Tutorial tickets are only available until **30 June**

Access to everything during the whole seven-day event (17-23 July).
**Net price €690.00 + 21% Czech VAT.**

Available until sold out or 30 June.

Access to Conference Days & Sprint Weekend (19-23 July) & limited access to specific sponsored/special workshops during the Workshop/Tutorial Days (17-18 July).
**Net price €675 + 21% Czech VAT**

Available from 30 June or after regular Conference tickets are sold out.

Access to everything during the whole seven-day event (17-23 July).
**Net price €1,035.00 + 21% Czech VAT.**

Available from 30 June or after regular Combined tickets are sold out.
If you enjoy Python as a hobbyist or use it as a freelancer.

Access to Conference Days & Sprint Weekend (19-23 July). Tutorials are **NOT** included. 
To access Tutorial days please buy a Tutorial or Combined ticket.

Access to Workshop/Tutorial Days (17-18 July) and the Sprint Weekend (22-23 July), but **NOT** the main conference (19-21 July).

Available until sold out or 30 June.

Access to everything during the whole seven-day event (17-23 July).

Available until sold out or 30 June.

Access to Conference Days & Sprint Weekend (19-23 July). Tutorials are NOT included. To access Tutorial days please buy a Tutorial or Combined ticket.

Available from 30 June or after regular Conference tickets are sold out.

Access to everything during the whole seven-day event (17-23 July).

Available from 30 June or after regular Combined tickets are sold out.
If you are a student, or a teacher working in the education sector (your main employment is at a school, college or university). We subsidise Education Tickets to make it accessible to everyone.

Access to Conference Days & Sprint Weekend (19-23 July). Tutorials are **NOT** included.
To access Tutorial days please buy a Tutorial or Combined ticket.

Access to Workshop/Tutorial Days (17-18 July) and the Sprint Weekend (22-23 July), but **NOT** the main conference (19-21 July).

Available until sold out or 30 June.
Access to everything during the whole seven-day event (17-23 July).
Thank you for Volunteering at EuroPython :) As a small token of thanks, a volunteer ticket granting you access to the entire conference.
Thank you for your contribution to the EuroPython conferences and the EPS! As a small token of appreciation, a Fellow ticket granting you access to the entire conference.

Thank you for your hard work on Python, the language we love and have built a community around! See you at EuroPython for open discussions, warm friendships and a nurturing environment for developing new core developers!

Thank you for your hard work on organising community events. 

A conference ticket as a small token of our thanks, granting you access to three days of the conference: Wednesday - Friday (19-21 July 2023) + Sprints Weekend. 

See you at EuroPython for open discussions and warm friendships!
For childcare during the conference days (19-21 July) Select multiple childcare tickets if you have multiple children requiring childcare.

Speaker Ticket - Access to three days of the conference: Wednesday-Friday (19-21 July 2023) + Sprints Weekend.
Thank you for choosing EuroPython to share your time and experience with the community. We hope that you have a fantastic time presenting at the conference.
The ticket is free. If you'd like to support our Finaid Programme - consider buying a ticket. Thanks! :)

Tutorial & Workshop Presenter Ticket - Access to all 5 days of the conference: Monday-Friday (17-21 July 2023) + Sprints Weekend.
Thank you for choosing EuroPython to share your time and experience with the community. We hope that you have a fantastic time presenting at the conference.
The ticket is free. If you'd like to support our Finaid Programme - consider buying a ticket. Thanks! :)

Keynote Presenter Ticket - Access to all 5 days of the conference: Monday-Friday (17-21 July 2023) + Sprints Weekend.
Thank you for choosing EuroPython to share your time and experience with the community. We hope that you have a fantastic time presenting at the conference.
Select this by 2 July to receive a free conference t-shirt, when booking a ticket. Please leave the option deselected if you want to opt out of receiving a t-shirt.

Grant ticket, giving you access to the conference days and sprints (19-23 July) of EuroPython 2023! 
Have a fantastic time!
Thanks you for supporting EuroPython to be even better :)
Thanks you for supporting EuroPython to be even better :)
Thanks you for supporting EuroPython to be even better :)

Attend EuroPython 2023 remotely - access to all sessions during the Conference Days 19-21 July 2023.

*Remote Tickets are invoiced by the EuroPython Society (the EPS) and taxed in Sweden. Since the EPS is a tax exempt non-profit, we do not charge VAT on the remote ticket invoices.*
If your company pays for you to attend remotely. When you purchase a Business Ticket, you help us keep the conference affordable for everyone. Thank you!
If you enjoy Python as a hobbyist or use it as a freelancer.

Open and free access to the livestreams of our conference talks (19-21 July). Register a ticket to receive email reminder or up-to-date information. The free livestream-only ticket does not include access to our online platform;  no interaction is provided with the speakers or other in-person audience.

Remote Grant ticket, giving you access to remote participation of the conference days (19-21 July) of EuroPython 2023! 
Have a fantastic time!

Open and free access to the livestreams of our conference talks (19-21 July). Register a ticket to receive email reminder or up-to-date information. The free livestream-only ticket does not include access to our online platform;  no interaction is provided with the speakers or other in-person audience.
